eventParts.text: Halt! This area is off limits. You have to go around.
But we need to get through here!
No can do. It’s way too dangerous in here.

Hm. When my mom talked to me about taking over the shop she always said I would have to negotiate with other merchants sooner or later. Maybe I can convince the soldier to let us through. What do you think?

eventConsequence.selectionText: This is a great opportunity to practice! I believe in you!
eventConsequence.conclusionText: Listen! We’re on an important mission and we have to get through! We’re following some vultures and we have to catch up with them so they don’t get away!

eventConsequence.selectionText: We can go around if you’re not feeling up to it. It’s your choice.
eventConsequence.conclusionText: Mmm, alright. Yeah, we can go around. It’s probably for the better. The soldier did say it was dangerous in there.
